strings.evolution:
Chomp! Chomp!
...Oh? Seems my partner is pleased!
strings.affinity:
To have believed in a weird one like me,
you must be quite strange, yourself.
I look forward to our continued path together!
strings.description: A knight that combines his strength as a warrior with the swiftness of his chocobo. Chocobo knights make for chivalrous and heroic figures in battle, but Fohlen didn't learn his true purpose until he set out on a journey of self-discovery with his feathery partner. He learned every single fighting skill he knows firsthand by vanquishing beasts in order to cover for his traveling expenses. A free-spirit by nature, Fohlen allows very little to ruffle his feathers.
strings.fusion:
Oh wow, isn't that nice!
My partner and I can grow stronger together.
strings.summon:
Do you think it's old-fashioned
for a knight to ride on a chocobo?
Wait until you see what I'm capable of.

strings.affinity:
To have believed in a weird one like me,
you must be quite strange, yourself.
I look forward to our continued path together!
strings.description: An eccentric knight who fights atop a chocobo. Fohlen wears flexible and adjustable armor that allows him to wander around the world working as a mercenary for hire. Chocobos are usually used as a means of transportation and as a tool for cultivating the land, whilst most military forces prefer airships to carry out their duties. For this reason, chocobo knights are often frowned upon, making their numbers scarce.
strings.fusion:
Chomp, chomp!
...That wasn't me just now,
it was my happy, little partner.
strings.summon:
I am Fohlen!
This chocobo is my partner.
We both look forward to working with you.
